[Home](./index.md) &gt; [qnrtc-uniapp-sdk](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.md)

## qnrtc-uniapp-sdk package

七牛 UniApp 原生插件

## Remarks

QNRTC-Uniapp 是基于 [UNIAPP](https://uniapp.dcloud.io/)<!-- -->、 [QNRTC-Android](https://developer.qiniu.com/rtc/8764/an-overview-of-the-android-sdk) 以及 [QNRTC-iOS](https://developer.qiniu.com/rtc/8830/an-overview-of-the-ios-sdk) 三者所实现的。

前端可通过 QNRTC-Uniapp 所提供的 JS 插件调用原生 Android 以及 iOS 的 RTC 接口来实现实时音视频通话。

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [RTCEngine](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.rtcengine.md) | RTCEngine 是 SDK 的入口 |

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [onAudioRouteChanged](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.onaudioroutechanged.md) | 当本地音频播放设备改变时会触发此回调 |

|  [onMessageReceived](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.onmessagereceived.md) | 当收到自定义消息时发此回调 |
|  [onMixing](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.onmixing.md) | 混音操作进行过程中会不断触发此回调 |

|  [onStoppedLiveStreaming](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.onstoppedlivestreaming.md) | 转推任务成功停止时触发此回调 |

|  [onUserJoined](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.onuserjoined.md) | 当远端用户加入房间时会触发此回调 |
|  [onUserLeft](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.onuserleft.md) | 当远端用户离开房间时会触发此回调 |
|  [onUserPublished](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.onuserpublished.md) | 当远端 Track 发布时会触发此回调 |
|  [onUserReconnected](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.onuserreconnected.md) | 当远端用户重连成功时会触发此回调 |
|  [onUserReconnecting](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.onuserreconnecting.md) | 当远端用户进入重连时会触发此回调 |
|  [onUserUnpublished](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.onuserunpublished.md) | 当远端 Track 取消发布时会触发此回调 |

|  [QNScreenPermissionResultCallback](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.qnscreenpermissionresultcallback.md) | 请求录屏权限后回调 |
